item.title: Add offset and size parameters to readblob() [9.0.0795]
item.description: Before it always read the entire file.

item.title: Add 'lispoptions' [9.0.0761]
item.description: Setting lispoptions=indentexpr:1 allows using 'indentexpr' when 'lisp' is enabled.

item.title: Add TextChangedT [9.0.0756]
item.description: Triggered afted text changed in the |terminal-window|.

item.title: Add "C" in 'shortmess' [9.0.0738]
item.description: Supress messages during |ins-completion|

item.title: Sound functions work on macOS [9.0.0694]
item.description: sound_playevent() now works on macOS

item.title: Add :echowindow [9.0.0321, 9.0.0350, 9.0.0352, 9.0.0356, 9.0.0431, 9.0.0447, 9.0.0551, 9.0.0683]
item.description: Display message in popup window; also add popup_findecho().

item.title: Add lastline in 'fillchars' [9.0.0656, 9.0.0661]
item.description: Set character to use for when 'display' contains fillchars or truncate.

item.title: Add 'splitkeep' [9.0.0445, 9.0.0455, 9.0.0469, 9.0.0486, 9.0.0505, 9.0.0647]
item.description: Control scrolling behaviour when opening, closing or resizing horizontal splits.

item.title: matchaddpos() can add many matches [9.0.0620, 9.0.0622]
item.description: Previously limited to 8.

item.title: Virtual text [9.0.0067, …many…, 9.0.0534]
item.description: Allow adding |virtual-text| to buffers.

item.title: Drop Windows XP and Vista support [9.0.0496]
Add keytrans() [9.0.0449]
item.description: Convert escape sequences to strings.

item.title: Add :defer [9.0.0370, 9.0.0419, 9.0.0440]
item.description: Run code when a function exits.

item.title: Add 'D' flag in writefile() and mkdir() [9.0.0379, 9.0.0411]
item.description: Delete the file or directory when a function exits.

item.title: Set cursor shape in Windows terminal [9.0.0347]
item.description: |termcap-cursor-shape| works on Windows.

item.title: Add getscriptinfo() [9.0.0244, 9.0.0253, 9.0.0269, 9.0.0303]
item.description: :scriptnames, but more convenient for scripts.

item.title: Add setcmdline() [9.0.0285]
item.description: Set the commandline content and cursor position from a script.

item.title: Add indexof() [9.0.0196, 9.0.0202, 9.0.0204]
item.description: Find value in list with a callback function.

item.title: Support double, dotted, and dashed underline [9.0.0007]
item.description: Can use |underdouble|, |underdotted|, and |underdashed| attributes in :highlight.

item.title: Add virtcol2col() [8.2.5034]
item.description: Get byte index from virtual column.

item.title: Add << and >> operators [8.2.5003, 8.2.5004]
item.description: Bitwise shift operators.

item.title: Add autocmd_add(), autocmd_get(), autocmd_delete() [8.2.4981, 8.2.5011, 8.2.5030]
item.description: Functions to manipulate autocmds.

item.title: Add / in 'formatoptions' [8.2.4907, 8.2.5008]
item.description: Don't insert // when using |o| on a line with inline comment ('cindent' only).

item.title: Add getcmdcompltype(), getcmdscreenpos() [8.2.4903]
item.description: Get type and position of current command-line completion.

item.title: Add string interpolation [8.2.4883]
item.description:
Allow expressions inside {…} when a string is prefixed with $; e.g.
$"Hello, {$USER} at {strftime('%c', localtime())}"

item.title: Add column to 'breakindentopt [8.2.4882]
item.description: Indent soft-wrapped lines at specific column.

item.title: Restore mappings [8.2.4861]
item.description: mapset() accepts the dict returned from maparg() or maplist(), making it easy to save and restore mappings.

item.title: Add isabsolutepath() [8.2.4838]
item.description: Check if a path is absolute.

item.title: Add maplist() [8.2.4820, 8.2.4825, 8.2.4932]
item.description: Get list of all mappings.

item.title: Add |hl-CurSearch| [8.2.4724, 8.2.4805, 8.2.5047]
item.description: Highlight the current search match.

item.title: Allow expressions in heredoc [8.2.4770, 8.2.4804]
item.description:
Allow expressions in heredoc as `=expr` if eval is added: 
let lines =<< trim eval END
    See the file `=$HOME`/.vimrc
END

item.title: Support LSP in channels [8.2.4648, 8.2.4758, 8.2.4761, 8.2.4780]
item.description: Support |language-server-protocol| (LSP) in channels.

item.title: Add |--log| [8.2.4742]
item.description: Start logging on startup.

item.title: |WinScrolled| event [8.2.4713]
item.description: Triggered after scrolling a window contents.

item.title: Add :profile stop and dump [8.2.4712]
item.description: Allow stopping profiling and dumping the profile to file (previously this was only on Vim exit).

item.title: Open channel on Unix domain socket [8.2.4684]
item.description: ch_open('unix:/tmp/socket')

item.title: Add "fuzzy" to 'wildoptions' [8.2.4463, 8.2.4608]
item.description: "Fuzzy" completion for commandline.

item.title: |DirChangedPre| event [8.2.4335]
item.description: Triggered before changing directory.

item.title: Add %e and %k in 'errorformat' [8.2.4329]
item.description: End line and column.

item.title: Add "pum:" to 'wildoptions' [8.2.4325]
item.description: Show popup menu for commandline completion.

item.title: Add "timeout" to 'spellsuggest' [8.2.4249]
item.description: Limit time searching for spell suggestions; previously always 5000ms.

item.title: P in visual mode [8.2.4242]
item.description: "Put" (paste) text in visual mode without yanking the deleted text to the unnamed register.

item.title: win_move_separator(), win_move_statusline() [8.2.4052]
item.description: Move and resize windows.

item.title: builtin.txt [8.2.3917]
item.description: Split eval.txt in to builtin.txt

item.title: Remove "in development" from Vim9 [8.2.3906]
item.description: The "THIS IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT - ANYTHING CAN BREAK - ANYTHING CAN CHANGE" warning from Vim9 documentation is removed, marking it as stable.

item.title: Allow script-local functions in *expr options [8.2.3900]
item.description: Can now use e.g. set diffexpr=s:MyDiffExpr().

item.title: Add :argdedeupe [8.2.3888]
item.description: Remove duplicate entries from the argument list.

item.title: reduce(), filter(), and map() work on strings [8.2.3818, 8.2.3848]
Assign lambda to options that take a function [8.2.3619, 8.2.3665, 8.2.3712, 8.2.3725, 8.2.3735, 8.2.3751]
item.description: The 'operatorfunc', 'tagfunc', 'completefunc', 'omnifunc', and 'imactivatefunc' can now accept a lambda.

item.title: Add hl-CursorLineSign, hl-CursorLineFold [8.2.3664]
item.description: Adjust sign highlighting for 'cursorline'.

item.title: Add hlget(), hlset() [8.2.3578, 8.2.3605]
item.description: Manipulate highlights programmatically.

item.title: Add |WinClosed| event [8.2.3591]
item.description: Triggered when closing a window.

item.title: Add |v:colornames| [8.2.3562]
item.description: Map colour names to hex codes.

item.title: Add 'guiligatures' [8.2.3524]
item.description: Support using ligatures in the GTK GUI.

item.title: Add 'thesaurusfunc' [8.2.3520]
item.description: Function to use for thesaurus completion.

item.title: |ModeChanged| event [8.2.3430]
item.description: Triggered when the mode changes.

item.title: Add multispace to 'listchars' [8.2.3424]
item.description: Show two or more spaces no matter where they appear.

item.title: Add digraph_get(), digraph_getlist(), digraph_set(), digraph_setlist() [8.2.3184, 8.2.3226]
item.description: List and define digraphs from functions.

item.title: Add list to 'breakindentopt' [8.2.3160, 8.2.3198]
item.description: Add additional indent for lines that match a numbered or bulleted list (using the 'formatlistpat' setting).

item.title: Add \%.l, \%<.l, and \%>.l patterns [8.2.3110]
item.description: Match the line the cursor is currently on; see |/\%l|.

item.title: Add 'cryptmethod'=xchaha20 [8.2.3022]
item.description: More secure encryption from libsodium.

item.title: Add |zp|, |zP|, |zy| [8.2.2914, 8.2.2971]
item.description: |zp| pastes in block mode without adding trailing whitespace, |zy| yanks without trailing whitespace.

item.title: Add {% to 'statusline' [8.2.2854]
item.description: {%expr%} reëvaluates the expression as a 'statusline' formatting string.

item.title: Add f flag in :vimgrep [8.2.2813]
item.description: "Fuzzy" match :vimgrep results.

item.title: Add 'autoshelldir' [8.2.2675]
item.description: Automatically change directory in Vim from terminal window.

item.title: Add strcharlen() [8.2.2606]
item.description: Get length of string counting combining characters separately.

item.title: Loop over a string [8.2.2658]
item.description: Loop over a string as `for char in "str"`; loops are by codepoint with any combining characters.

item.title: Expand 'fillchars' [8.2.2508, 8.2.2518, 8.2.2518, 8.2.2542, 8.2.2569]
item.description:
New values: "eob" to change change the (~) to indicate non-existing lines, "foldopen", "foldclose", and "foldsep" to change 'foldcolumn' markers.
'fillchars' can be set per-window (previously it was always global).
Also allow multibyte characters in 'fillchars' and 'statusline'.

item.title: Add followwrap to 'diffopt' [8.2.2490]
item.description: Don't reset 'wrap' for diff windows.

item.title: Add fullcommand() [8.2.2468]
item.description: Get the full command name from abbreviated ones (e.g. :s → :substitute)

item.title: lead: in 'listchars' [8.2.2454]
item.description: Highlight leading spaces when 'list' is set.

item.title: Detect focus events in terminal [8.2.2345, 8.2.2348, 8.2.2352, 8.2.2383, 8.2.2428]
item.description: The |FocusGained| and |FocusLost| autocmds can work inside a terminal. See |xterm-focus-event|.

item.title: :sleep! [8.2.2366]
item.description: Sleep and hide cursor.

item.title: Add charcol(), getcharpos(), setcharpos(), getcursorcharpos(), setcursorcharpos() [8.2.2324]
item.description: Multibyte-aware versions of col(), getpos(), setpos(), getcurpos(), cursor().

item.title: Add charidx() [8.2.2233]
item.description: Convert byte index to character index.

item.title: Add |VimSuspend| and |VimResume| [8.2.2128]
item.description: Triggered on suspend/resume; only for <C-z> and not SIGSTP/SIGCONT signals.

item.title: Add <Cmd> [8.2.1978]
:sort and sort() can do locale-aware sorting [8.2.1933]
item.description: :sort l or sort(..., 'l').

item.title: matchfuzzy(), matchfuzzypos() [8.2.1665, 8.2.1726, 8.2.1893, 8.2.1921]
item.description: "Fuzzy" matching.

item.title: Add |InsertLeavePre| [8.2.1874]
item.description: Triggered before leaving insert mode.

item.title: |??| operator [8.2.1794]
item.description: echo value ?? 'used if value is empty'

item.title: Add gettext() [8.2.1544]
item.description: Can be used to translate plugins.

item.title: Add setcellwidths(), charclass() [8.2.1535, 8.2.1536]
item.description: Allow overriding the display width for characters whose width is ambiguous.

item.title: Add g<Tab>; support :tabnext #, :tabclose #, etc. [8.2.1401, 8.2.1413]
item.description: g<Tab> goes back to the last accessed tab, and # in :tab* commands refer to the last accessed tab.

item.title: expand('<SID>') [8.2.1347]
item.description: Useful for the *func and *expr settings, e.g. let &includexpr = expand('<SID>') .. 'fun()' to use s:fun()

item.title: Add 'quickfixtextfunc' [8.2.0869, 8.2.0933, 8.2.0959, 8.2.1255]
item.description: Customize text contents of quickfix window; can also be passed as an argument to to setqflist()

item.title: Add sorting to readir(), readirex() [8.2.0988]
item.description: Add optional argument to readdir() and readdirex() to control sorting.

item.title: Add terminalprops() [8.2.0970]
item.description: List which features are supported in this terminal.

item.title: Add 'spelloptions' [8.2.0953]
item.description: Only accepted value is camel to spell check CamelCase words.

item.title: Add |SigUSR1| autocmd [8.2.0952]
item.description: Event to detect SIG_USR1.

item.title: Add flatten() [8.2.0935]
item.description: Flatten a list

item.title: Add getreginfo() [8.2.0924]
item.description: Returns detailed information for a register information; can be restored by passing to setreg().

item.title: Add searchcount() [8.2.0877]
item.description: Get details about current search.

item.title: Allow setting underline colour in terminal [8.2.0863]
item.description: Can use ctermul in :highlight to set the underline colour, or guisp if 'termguicolors' is enabled.

item.title: Add reduce() [8.2.0878]
item.description: Reduce list to single value.

item.title: Add readirex() [8.2.0875]
item.description: Like readdir(), but return a dict with attributes (i.e. stat() on Unix).

item.title: Add getmarklist() [8.2.0861]
item.description: Get list of marks, similar to :marks

item.title: Add unsigned to 'nrformats' [8.2.0860]
item.description: Ignore - before numbers and always treat them as unsigned for <C-a> and <C-x> so that using it on e.g. 1985-06-18 works as expected.

item.title: Add mapset() [8.2.0807, 8.2.0812, 8.2.0815]
item.description: Set mappings from a script, and can restore mappings.

item.title: Call Vim functions from Lua [8.2.0775]
item.description: Call Vim functions from Lua with vim.call('fun_name', 'arg') and vim.fn.fun_name('arg').

item.title: IPv6 support in channels [8.2.0557, 8.2.0574]
item.description: IPv6 support in channels

item.title: Add echoraw() [8.2.0258]
item.description: Output string to terminal with no processing; can be used to send escape codes.

item.title: Add optional error code to :cquit [8.2.0095]
item.description: Exit with a specific code, instead of always 1. |v:exiting| was added in 8.2.2070 (Nov 2020)

item.title: rand() and srand() [8.1.2342, 8.1.2343]
item.description: Generate random numbers.

item.title: interrupt() [8.1.2341]
item.description: Abort a running script.

item.title: strptime() [8.1.2326]
item.description: Parse a time string

item.title: :terminal ++shell [8.1.2251, 8.1.2255]
item.description: Run :terminal commands in the shell.

item.title: v:argv [8.1.2233]
item.description: Get commandline arguments Vim was invoked with.

item.title: Add |gM| [8.1.2231]
item.description: Move to middle of line.

item.title: |hl-LineNrAbove|, |hl-LineNrBelow| [8.1.2229]
item.description: Highlight line numbers above and below the cursor when 'relativenumber' is set.

item.title: Add 'cursorlineopt' [8.1.2019]
item.description: More control on how to display 'cursorline'.

item.title: border and align in 'completepopup' [8.1.1902, 8.1.1904]
item.description: More option to control completion popup menu.

item.title: popup in 'completeopt' [8.1.1880, 8.1.1882]
item.description: Show extra completion info in popup window (as an alternative to the preview window).

item.title: :spellrare [8.1.1838]
item.description: Mark words as rare in the spellfile.

item.title: -> operator [8.1.1803, 8.1.1809, 8.1.1834, 8.1.1835, 8.1.1996]
Popup windows [8.1.1364, 8.1.1391, 8.1.1799, 8.1.1905, 8.1.1928]
item.description: Popup windows are like the completion window, but can be controlled in VimScript to a much greater degree. See |popup|, 'previewpopup'. This is still an experimental feature.

item.title: 'completeslash' [8.1.1769]
item.description: Override 'shellslash' for completion.

item.title: #{} dict notation [8.1.1683, 8.1.1692, 8.1.1705]
item.description:
The #{} notation is the same as the regular {} dict notation, except that the key values don't need quoting:
#{foo: "bar"}.

item.title: Sound functions [8.1.1502, 8.1.1565]
item.description: Ability to play sound; see sound_playevent().

item.title: |v:option_command|, |v:option_oldlocal|, |v:option_oldglobal| [8.1.1542]
item.description: Improvements for the |OptionSet| event.

item.title: :const [8.1.1539]
item.description: Constants; same as :let v = 1 | :lockvar v

item.title: win_execute() [8.1.1418]
item.description: execute() in the context of a specific window.

item.title: 'wincolor' [8.1.1391]
item.description: Highlight group to use instead of |hl-Normal| for this window.

item.title: |g:actual_curwin|, |g:statusline_winid| [8.1.1372]
item.description: Temporarily set when running expressions inside the 'statusline' (%{expr}).

item.title: |:let=<<| [8.1.1354]
item.description:
Heredoc assignment:
let text =<< trim END
	text
END

item.title: Text properties [8.1.0579, 8.1.1340, 8.1.1341]
item.description: Assign metadata to text in a buffer, as an alternative to Vim's syntax highlighting. See |textprop|. This is still an experimental feature.

item.title: listener_add() [8.1.1320, 8.1.1321, 8.1.1332]
item.description: Add a callback that will be invoked when changed have been made to a buffer.

item.title: Default values for function arguments [8.1.1310]
item.description: e.g. function Fun(value=10). See |optional-function-argument|.

item.title: :xrestore [8.1.1307]
item.description: Reconnect to X server after restart.

item.title: environ(), getenv(), and setenv() [8.1.1305]
item.description: Deal with environment variables.

item.title: chdir() [8.1.1291]
item.description: Change directory with scope and ability to restore.

item.title: :cbefore, :cafter [8.1.1275]
item.description: Navigate to errors before/after the cursor.

item.title: Show match position when searching [8.1.1270]
item.description: Show "3/44" when using |n| and "S" is not in 'shortmess'.

item.title: :cabove, :cbelow, :labove, :lbelow [8.1.1256]
item.description: Navigate through errors relative to the cursor.

item.title: Control font weight on Windows' [8.1.1224]
item.description: Use "W" in 'guifont' to control font weight on Windows. See |gui-font|.

item.title: Tab-local directory [8.1.1218]
item.description: See :tcd. Similar to the window-local directory with :lcd.

item.title: v: prefix is required [8.1.1188]
item.description: Previously e.g. count would also work. The v: prefix is mandatory when :scriptversion is 3 or higher.

item.title: Add more arguments to winnr() [8.1.1140]
item.description: To find out what neighbors a window has.

item.title: |CompleteChanged| event [8.1.1138]
item.description: After each time the Insert mode completion menu changed.

item.title: str2list() and list2str() [8.1.1122]
item.description: Convert a string to a list of byte, or the reverse.

item.title: readdir() [8.1.1120]
item.description: Get contents of a directory.

item.title: :scriptversion [8.1.1116]
item.description: Specify VimScript compatibility level.

item.title: .. operator [8.1.1114]
item.description: String concatenation operator, as . is ambiguous. 'a' .. 'b' and 'a' . 'b' are identical. Also adds ..=.

item.title: ++once argument for :autocmd [8.1.1113]
item.description: Run an autocommand just once, e.g. au CursorMoved * ++once :echom 'ONCE'.

item.title: Add window ID argument to matchdelete(), clearmatches(), getmatches(), setmatches() [8.1.1084]
complete_info() [8.1.1068]
item.description: Get information about current completion.

item.title: rubyeval() [8.1.1056]
item.description: Evaluate a Ruby expression.

item.title: |CTRL-W_gt|, |CTRL-W_gT| [8.1.0972]
item.description: Switch tabs, like |gt| and |gT|. Mainly useful to switch from terminal window.
e.g. let var *= 2

item.title: a: variables are immutable [8.1.0888, 8.1.0897]
item.description: Previously it was possible to change a: variables in some cases.

item.title: Allow for a third character for "tab:" in 'listchars' [8.1.0759]
item.description: Third character is set as the last one for a tab, e.g. set listchars=tab:(_) shows a tab as (______).

item.title: Blob type [8.1.0735, 8.1.0756, 8.1.0757]
item.description: A blob stores binary data. Blob literals start with 0z, e.g. 0zDEADBEEF. See |blob|.

item.title: "p" flag in 'formatoptions' [8.1.0728]
item.description: Don't break lines at single spaces that follow periods.

item.title: :redrawtabline [8.1.0706]
item.description: Redraw tabline after changing 'tabline' (mainly useful for plugins).

item.title: sign_place(), sign_unplace(), etc [8.1.0614, 8.1.0658]
item.description: Functions for defining and placing signs.

item.title: Allow functions and commands to redefine themselves [8.1.0515, 8.1.0573]
item.description: Previously a ! always had to be added to function to overwrite a function with the same name. Now Vim is smarter and allows a function to overwrite itself. This means that using function! in your vimrc or plugin's autoload is almost never required any more.

item.title: :tlmenu [8.1.0487]
item.description: Popup menu for terminal.

item.title: Include the xdiff library [8.1.0360, 8.1.0393]
item.description: Include diff library instead of relying on external tools to improve diff quality. Many new 'diffopt' settings (e.g. set diffopt+=internal,algorithm:patience would be a good setting for many).

Comments in line continuations; see |line-continuation-comment|: 
au FileType git
            "\ Go to commit.
            \  nnoremap <Leader>g :exe printf(":!cd ~/src/vim && git diff %s^\!", split(getline("."), ' ')[1])<CR>
            "\ Delete commit.
            \| nnoremap <Leader>d :call search('^commit ', 'bc') \| :exe 'd' . (search('^commit ', 'n') - line("."))<CR>

item.title: |cfilter-plugin| [8.1.0311]
item.description: Filter quickfix/location list

item.title: 'vartabstop', 'varsofttabstop' [8.1.0105]
item.description: Variable tabstop widths, e.g. set vartabstop=4,8 makes the first tab 4 spaces, and the rest 8.

item.title: |OptionSet| autocmd [8.1.0081, 8.1.0414]
item.description: Triggered whenever an option is set.

item.title: prompt buffer [8.1.0027, 8.1.0035]
item.description: Mainly useful to feed user input to a job.

item.title: Allow :unlet $ENV [8.0.1832]
item.description: Previously there was no way to truly unset an environment variable (just set it to an empty string).

item.title: CTRL-R CTRL-L [8.0.1787]
item.description: Insert line from buffer in commandline

item.title: job_info() without argument lists all jobs [8.0.1742]
mkdir('p') won't fail fail if the directory already exists [8.0.1708]
Add the terminal API. [8.0.1641]
item.description: See |terminal-api|.

item.title: trim() [8.0.1630]
item.description: Clean whitespace; had to use substitute() before.

item.title: Add "!" to 'guioptions' [8.0.1609, 8.0.1616]
item.description: Use a Vim terminal window for :! shell commands.

item.title: Menus in terminal [8.0.1558, 8.0.1570]
item.description: Make :popup and right-click work in terminal.

item.title: 24 bit colors in Windows console [8.0.1531]
item.description: See 'termguicolors'.

item.title: 'pumwidth' [8.0.1491]
item.description: Minimum width of completion menu.

item.title: |DirChanged| event [8.0.1459]
item.description: When directory changed (with :cd, :lcd, etc.)

item.title: |CmdlineChanged| event [8.0.1445]
item.description: After a change was made to the text in the command line.

item.title: |TextYankPost| event [8.0.1394]
item.description: After yanking or deleting text.

item.title: win_screenpos(). [8.0.1364]
item.description: Get winow position.

item.title: |CmdlineEnter|, |CmdlineLeave| [8.0.1206]
item.description: When entering and leaving the commandline.

item.title: :terminal [8.0.0693, 8.0.0730, 8.0.0744, 8.0.0804, 8.0.0929, 8.0.1108]
item.description: Terminal buffer.

item.title: |--clean|, 'viminfofile' [8.0.0716]
item.description: Start Vim with the default settings and without plugins.

item.title: E flag in 'cinoptions' [8.0.0431]
item.description: Set indent for extern block.

item.title: 'pyxversion', :pythonx [8.0.0251]
item.description: Make it easier to run Python code in both Python 2 and 3, depending on what is available.
